Question: InFlux Technologies Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
InFlux Technologies Limited

FluxEdge

- Utilizes Proof of Useful Work (PoUW) in blockchain for AI compute challenges
- Leverages GPU power globally for efficient AI algorithm processing
- Offers Edge-as-a-Service (EaaS) in a decentralized manner
Summary_cn:
InFlux Technologies Limited

FluxEdge

- 在区块链中利用有效工作证明（PoUW）进行人工智能计算挑战
- 全球利用GPU算力进行高效的人工智能算法处理
- 以分散式的方式提供边缘计算服务（EaaS）
